posts.post_content: Green aggro FINALLY got their answer to wrath spells. Token decks will love this little gem. The color green has needed this card for YEARS now, just like black needed Go For The Throat for a long time. Just sack a ton of Eldrazi tokens with casting this bad boy, and you will have an army like nobody's business!
